title: MWC 2023
description: MWC Taiwan 2023 is hosted by Taiwan's largest technical blog. I spoke about Headless CMS system application in frontend in the event.

title: GDG DevFest 2024
description: Google developer group DevFest 2024 is hosted by the Kaohsiung GDG community. I spoke about how to adopt to the fast-moving AI trend, and the foundamentals of frontend performance.

title: Seidor GO
description: This educational event is hosted by Seidor. I introduced SPA and SAP's Spartacus frontend framework to the backend developers.

title: Community Sharing
description: I actively share what I know in learning community like Alpha Camp or Company workshops.

media.alt: An ac event for women's day
